question:
hi there how are you doing this evening ?
hi , sitting here with my three dogs watching the olympics !
nice i do not want to go back to work i am a waitress
i love being in a polyamorous open relationship !
iol well i wish i was brave enough to do that
my father was a salesman , helps my dog walking business now
that is nice i've a motorbike don't know what car to get for winter
very very cool . sounds fun
yes i had them put red with blue stripes to be shinny for when racing
so is my dog , wow so cool
so what do you do in your spare time ?
lead singer for a band , music teacher
wow nice are you really good ?
millions of plays on soundcloud
really would you share or are you shy
fact:
your persona: i also have a dog walking business.
your persona: i've three dogs.
your persona: my father was a door to door salesman.
your persona: i am in an open polyamorous relationship.
your persona: i like to watch the olympics.

response.KV-MemNN: i know what you mean spend most nights cuddling my dog and star watching
response.Seq2Seq: i am a little shy but i am a little shy
response.Language Model: i am not . i am a student .
response.New Human Generated: i only feel comfortable sharing my music with my dogs !

question:
hello there , how are you ?
i am well and you ? in honor of aim i'll ask a s l
45 m chicago in town . just trying to stay away from the bars
i am 37 f tampa . i like my walks on the beach and cheeseburgers in paradise .
funny thing is i came from farm life
i was named after a horse . my boyfriend likes to may nay sounds at me .
sounds like the crazy medicine i take
just do not mix with alcohol or can get crazy around here .
i used to be an alcoholic so no can do
i tend to stick to my water only . soda is worse !
that's what everyone should strive for
as long as i have my french fries !
well everyone can cheat once in a while
of course . now all of this has made me hungry .
you can go for some grub
fact:
your persona: i like to take walks.
your persona: i don't drink soda.
your persona: i've a boyfriend.
your persona: i like to eat hamburgers and french fries.

response.Original Ground Truth: chicago has some great places to eat too .
response.KV-MemNN: i will win , i am telling you . then i will drive my sx into the stars .
response.Seq2Seq: i will try that . i am a bit of a tea person .
response.Language Model: i do not know what to say .
response.New Human Generated: maybe i'll take go for a walk and get a burger after .
